attributes.action: VOTE OF NO CONFIDANCE IN THE UK GOVERNMENT.
attributes.additional_details: IS IT NOT ABOUT TIME WE STARTED AGAIN,WITH ALL THE LOOTING AND FIGHTING ON OUR STREETS, NO JOBS , MORE TAXES FOR THE WORKING PEOPLE, THE MORE WE WORK THE MORE TAXES WE PAY, THE BENIFIT SYSTEM IS A MESS,  MY FATHER PASSED AWAY 32 YEARS AGO MUM WAS LEFT TO GET ON WITH IT NO BENIFIT WE HAD TO DO WITH WHAT WE HAD OR AN EXTRA BIG HOUSE FROM THE LOCAL COUNCIL , MY BROTHERS AND SISTERS ALL HAVE GOOD JOBS  AND FAMILIES OF THEIR OWN, WE CHOSE OUR PATH, SO LETS GET THIS PATH FIXED FOR OUR FUTURE,
